tool_description: A fast, reliable source of continuously updated exchange rates.
name: Exchange Rate API
title: Exchange Rate API

api_list.name: /exchange/{source_currency}/{target_currency}
api_list.description: Retrieve the exchange rate between two specified currencies. The base currency (Currency A) is always set to 1 unit, and the value of the exchange rate is provided in terms of the second currency (Currency B).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rate-api4.p.rapidapi.com/exchange/USD/JPY"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rate-api4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /exchange/{source_currency}/{target_currency}/{amount}
api_list.description: Calculate the monetary value in the target currency (Currency B) based on the provided exchange rate and the amount in the base currency (Currency A).
